alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Grundy (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:12AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Black Hawk, Bremer, northeastern Grundy and northeastern Butler Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 311 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greene to 6 miles south of Shell Rock to 7 miles north of Traer. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of up to three more inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Shell Rock and Uni-Dome And McLeod Center around 315 AM CDT. Cedar Falls around 325 AM CDT. Waterloo Municipal Airport around 330 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Waverly, La Porte City, Denver, Elk Run Heights, Jesup and Tripoli. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
